com.github.mrgoro.interactivedata.spring.service

Class ChartRequestHandlerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mrgoro.interactivedata.spring.service.ChartRequestHandlerService

  • @Service
public class ChartRequestHandlerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service providing specific request handlers for charts by their identifiers (service name and chart name). If a CacheManager is configured for the application, the result of getChartRequestHandler(String, String) is cached with the name "chartRequestHandler". This can improve performance by not needing to locate, initialize and setup the ChartRequestHandler each time.
    Author:
    Philipp Schürmann

      ChartRequestHandler getChartRequestHandler(java.lang.String serviceName, java.lang.String chartName)

    • Method Detail

      • getChartRequestHandler

        @Cacheable(value="chartRequestHandler")
public ChartRequestHandler getChartRequestHandler(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                                                                           java.lang.String chartName)
        Get a ChartRequestHandler that is capable of handling the chart with the given service and chart name. If a CacheManager is configured for the application, the result is cached with the name "chartRequestHandler". This can improve performance by not needing to locate, initialize and setup the ChartRequestHandler each time.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - Name of the ChartService
        chartName - Name of the Chart
        Returns:
        ChartRequestHandler
